response.overview: On March 10th GCW: So Much Fun 2024 is live on TrillerTV+ straight from Showboat in Atlantic City, NJ. The event features the GCW World Title Match where Blake Christian defends the title against Masha Slamovich.  Also in the lineup:  Joey Janela vs Jack Cartwheel  Brandon Kirk vs Microman  Six Man Tag Team Match  Thrussy (Allie Katch, Dark Sheik & Effy) vs Maki Death Kill Club (Maki Itoh, Matt Tremont & Nick Gage)  Tag Team Match  Gahbage Daddies (Alec Price & Cole Radrick) vs Rich And Powerful (Charles Mason & Richard Holliday)  Tag Team Match  Abdullah Kobayashi & Ryuji Ito vs Los Macizos (Ciclope & Miedo Extremo)  John Wayne Murdoch vs Kasey Catal
response.title: GCW So Much Fun 2024
